p: The effect of MPE on the total lipid content of F. sporotrichioides is shown in Table 3. The lipid content of pathogen is decreased after treating with MPE. The total lipid contents of F. sporotrichioides after incubation with MPE at MIC and MFC for 120 min were 120.1 ± 3.5 and 80.4 ± 4.6 mg/g dry weight, respectively, which were significantly lower than that of control (160.2 ± 3.8 mg/g dry weight).
